results.title: Windows Sockets Error Codes (Winsock2.h) - Win32 apps
results.description: Windows Sockets (Winsock) error codes returned by the WSAGetLastError function.

descriptions.content: WSA_IO_INCOMPLETE996 Overlapped I/O event object not in signaled state.
WSA_IO_PENDING997 Overlapped operations will complete later.

results.title: Overview Socket.IO on Azure
results.description: Get an overview of Azure's support for the open-source Socket.IO library.

descriptions.content: Overview Socket.IO on Azure Socket.IO is a widely popular open-source library for real-time messaging between clients and a server.
Azure provides a fully managed cloud solution for Socket.IO.
Quickstart for Socket.IO users Migrate a self-hosted Socket.IO app to Azure Feedback Was this page helpful?

results.title: Use Sockets to send and receive data over TCP - .NET
results.description: Learn how the Socket class exposes socket network communication functionality in .NET.

descriptions.content: Learn how the Socket class exposes socket network communication functionality in .NET.
